plot outline: Some seats are allotted to ministers in colleges . A minister asks more seats to be allotted to him . But college authority disagrees . The angry minister leaves his students in college to fight with other students . In this many students will be killed . Then hero enters to save life of a student but he dies . Hero gets motivation from student mother to fight the minister . Will he succeed or not ? Forms the rest of the story
title: Chakravyuha
plot: A corrupt law minister incites violence in a law college and the police turn a blind eye. Lohith, a college student, turns into a vigilante and tries to punish the offender.

Some seats are allotted to ministers in colleges . A minister asks more seats to be allotted to him . But college authority disagrees . The angry minister leaves his students in college to fight with other students . In this many students will be killed . Then hero enters to save life of a student but he dies . Hero gets motivation from student mother to fight the minister . Will he succeed or not ? Forms the rest of the story

The Law minister messes with the college authorities for the seats. In the process, many innocent students get killed by the minister's younger brother . Hence getting motivated by this, a guy stands against the minister and kidnaps his brother. Then the story gets twisted and the rest forms the plot.
